name: mAZe (itch) (Project Sigma)
description:
Project mAZe Or Simply Known As "Maze" Is A Sci-Fi Horror Game Where You Search Through Memory Layers To Find Missing Fragments In Midst Of Hunting " Creatures ".

Can You Survive This Or Get Lost Like Those Fragments. Find Out By Playing Now.

N.B : THIS GAME IS CURRENTLY IN DEVELOPMENT. WE ARE  STILL TWAEKING SOME STUFF FOR PLAYERS TO ENJOY.
